bibl.title: Latin Influence and Greek Request Formulae.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The request formula ἐρωτῶ [Nos 1-9]. - 3. The request formula παρακαλῶ [Nos 10-20]. - 4. Pairing παρακαλῶ of with ἐρωτῶ [Nos 21-24].- 5. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: DICKEY Eleanor, Latin Influence and Greek Request Formulae.
Trevor V. EVANS and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri (Oxford, 2010) pp. 208-220.
1. Introduction. - 2. The request formula ἐρωτῶ [Nos 1-9]. - 3. The request formula παρακαλῶ [Nos 10-20]. - 4. Pairing παρακαλῶ of with ἐρωτῶ [Nos 21-24].- 5. Conclusion.
